rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Scandinavian minimalism. Natural light is maximized through large windows.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Cozy yet open living space that flows into the courtyard. Focused on minimalistic furniture and warm lighting.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater with soundproofing and ambient Scandinavian design. Perfect for family movie nights.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed in a Scandinavian style with modern appliances and storage solutions. Adjacent to dining area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the kitchen area that overlooks the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Level 1)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light. Incorporates Vastu principles for the north-east corner placement.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity and natural materials.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom
rooms.description: Safe, playful environment for children with vibrant yet minimalistic decor. Vastu considerations ensure harmony and growth.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass door ensuring ample natural light and a modern Scandinavian look.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: Access point to the central courtyard for natural ventilation and a serene outdoor space.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: Provides exterior view and natural light to the living room and adjacent areas.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Discreet entry for utilities and deliveries.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Level 1)
rooms.description: Lavish master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Decor includes subtle Scandinavian tones that align with Vastu principles for health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom equipped with modern fixtures and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed for ease of movement. Scandinavian simplicity is maintained.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom
rooms.description: Safe and inviting child's room with vibrant accents in a minimalist style.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Spacious staircase connecting the ground and first floor. Designed to be safe and accessible while maintaining Scandinavian elegance.

rooms.name: Home Office / Study
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace ensuring a quiet environment with ample natural light. Designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and functional layout.

rooms.name: Additional Storage / Utility
rooms.description: Compact space for extra storage or a utility room, ensuring clutter-free living.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to a small balcony for fresh air and natural light.
